Home.title: Welcome to
Home.description: A community coordination platform for the Organic DAO. Propose ideas, vote on decisions, and collaborate on tasks.
Home.heroTitle: A governance and execution hub for
Home.heroSubtitle: Organic is a production DAO platform where token holders guide the treasury, shape proposals, and turn decisions into real work.
Home.holdTokensCallout: Hold $ORG tokens? Link your wallet and get your Organic ID!
Home.proposalsDescription: Submit ideas and vote on proposals with token-weighted voting.
Home.tasksDescription: Turn approved proposals into tasks and track progress with sprints.
Home.sprintsDescription: Plan milestones, assign owners, and ship work in focused cycles.
Home.governanceDescription: Vote with $ORG and create binding decisions for the DAO.
Home.organicIdDescription: Token holders get a unique ID and verified member status.
Home.heroContractNote: Use the official $ORG mint address to verify you are interacting with the authentic DAO token.
Home.heroAccessBody: Link a wallet holding $ORG to unlock governance, tasks, and contributor tools.
Home.poweredByOrgDescription: The Organic DAO is a community-driven organization on Solana. Hold $ORG tokens to participate in governance and shape the future.
Home.capabilitiesSubtitle: Everything you need to propose, decide, and deliver inside the DAO.
Home.activitySubtitle: Live updates from proposals, tasks, and member activity.
Home.statusDescription: Track your identity, governance access, and contribution footprint across the DAO.
Home.statusCardOneBody: Verify membership by linking a wallet that holds $ORG.
Home.statusCardTwoBody: Your votes and shipped tasks build a durable on-chain footprint.
Home.statusCardThreeBody: See how your proposals and tasks move the DAO forward.

Wallet.linkWalletDescription: Link this wallet to your profile to verify membership.
Wallet.connectWalletFromNav: Connect your wallet using the button in the top bar.
Wallet.drawerSubtext: Connect your wallet to access Organic DAO. Your funds remain in your control. This app has been audited for security.
Wallet.noWalletCta: I don't have a Solana wallet
Wallet.createWalletComingSoonDescription: Embedded wallet creation will be available in a future update
Wallet.walletInfoFooter: Wallets are used to send, receive, and store digital assets. You maintain full control of your funds.

Signup.title: Sign up for Organic
Signup.passwordHelp: Password should be at least 8 characters including a number and a lowercase letter.
Signup.usernameHelp: Username may only contain alphanumeric characters or single hyphens, and cannot begin or end with a hyphen.
Signup.termsPrefix: By creating an account, you agree to the
Signup.termsSuffix: . We'll occasionally send you account-related emails.
Signup.validationPasswordShort: Password should be at least 8 characters
Signup.validationUsernamePattern: Username may only contain alphanumeric characters or single hyphens
Signup.validationUsernameHyphen: Username cannot begin or end with a hyphen
Signup.toastSuccess: Check your email to confirm your account!

AuthError.title: Authentication error
AuthError.description: We could not complete the sign-in. Please try again.

LoginBackup.signInPrompt: Sign in to access your account
LoginBackup.createPrompt: Create an account to get started
LoginBackup.toggleToSignUp: Don't have an account? Sign up
LoginBackup.toggleToSignIn: Already have an account? Sign in
LoginBackup.noteBody: After signing up, you'll receive a verification email. Check your inbox and spam folder.
LoginBackup.toastCheckEmail: Check your email to confirm your account!

Leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
Leaderboard.subtitle: Top contributors ranked by points earned from completed tasks
Leaderboard.emptyDescription: Complete tasks to earn points and appear on the leaderboard!
Leaderboard.howPointsItem1: • Complete assigned tasks to earn points
Leaderboard.howPointsItem2: • Each task has a point value based on its complexity
Leaderboard.howPointsItem3: • Points are automatically added when tasks are marked as done
Leaderboard.howPointsItem4: • Higher points = Higher ranking on the leaderboard

Proposals.title: Proposals
Proposals.subtitle: Submit ideas and vote on proposals for the Organic DAO
Proposals.ctaDescription: Sign in and link your wallet to create proposals and vote on decisions.

ProposalCreate.toastMustBeMember: You must be a member to create proposals
ProposalCreate.memberOnlyTitle: You need to be a member to create proposals
ProposalCreate.memberOnlyDescription: Link your wallet and hold $ORG tokens to become a member
ProposalCreate.title: Create New Proposal
ProposalCreate.subtitle: Share your idea with the Organic DAO community
ProposalCreate.placeholderTitle: Give your proposal a clear, concise title
ProposalCreate.placeholderDescription: Describe your proposal in detail. What problem does it solve? What are the benefits? What resources are needed?
ProposalCreate.guideline1: • Be clear and specific about what you're proposing
ProposalCreate.guideline2: • Explain the problem and your proposed solution
ProposalCreate.guideline3: • Include any relevant data or examples
ProposalCreate.nextStep1: 1. Community Discussion: Members can comment and provide feedback
ProposalCreate.nextStep2: 2. Review: Council members review the proposal
ProposalCreate.nextStep3: 3. Voting: If approved for voting, token holders can vote
ProposalCreate.nextStep4: 4. Implementation: Approved proposals can be converted to tasks

ProposalWizard.categoryDescription_feature: Propose new features or product improvements
ProposalWizard.categoryDescription_governance: Propose changes to DAO governance or policies
ProposalWizard.categoryDescription_treasury: Propose treasury allocations or budget changes
ProposalWizard.categoryDescription_development: Share development ideas or technical proposals
ProposalWizard.placeholderTitle: Give your proposal a clear, concise title
ProposalWizard.placeholderSummary: Briefly summarize your proposal in 1-2 sentences (50-300 characters)
ProposalWizard.placeholderMotivation: What problem does this proposal solve? Why is this important for the community?
ProposalWizard.placeholderSolution: Describe your proposed solution in detail. How will it work?
ProposalWizard.placeholderBudget: What budget or resources are needed? Break down costs if applicable.
ProposalWizard.placeholderTimeline: Estimated implementation timeline and key milestones

ProposalDetail.toastSignInToComment: You must be signed in to comment
ProposalDetail.createTaskHelp: Convert this approved proposal into a task on the task board
ProposalDetail.signInToJoin: Sign in to join the discussion
ProposalDetail.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to share your thoughts!
ProposalDetail.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this proposal? This action cannot be undone.

Sprints.title: Sprints
Sprints.subtitle: Track current sprint and view sprint history
Sprints.emptyAdmin: Create your first sprint to start tracking development progress
Sprints.emptyViewer: Sprints will appear here once created by council or admin members
Sprints.planningBacklogHint: Select backlog tasks to move into the selected sprint.
Sprints.noCurrentSprint: No current sprint to show yet
Sprints.noActiveSprint: No active sprint. Start one or plan the next.
Sprints.noUpcomingSprints: No upcoming sprints. Create the next sprint.
Sprints.noActiveOrUpcoming: No active or upcoming sprint yet.
Sprints.errorOnlyCouncil: Only council and admin members can create sprints
Sprints.timelineEmptyDesc: Completed sprints will appear here as a timeline of your progress.
Sprints.startSprintEmptyWarning: This sprint has no tasks. You can still start it, but consider adding tasks first.
Sprints.startSprintDescription: Starting this sprint will mark it as active. Only one sprint can be active at a time.
Sprints.incompleteTasksCount: {count} incomplete tasks need to be handled:
Sprints.incompleteBacklogDesc: Tasks will be unassigned from any sprint and returned to the backlog.
Sprints.incompleteNextSprintDesc: Tasks will be moved to a planning sprint.
Sprints.incompleteNoPlanningSprints: No planning sprints available. Create one first.

SprintDetail.notFoundDescription: This sprint may have been deleted or does not exist.
SprintDetail.burndownEmpty: Add tasks with points to see the burndown chart.
SprintDetail.noTasksDescription: Tasks assigned to this sprint will appear here.
SprintDetail.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this sprint? Tasks assigned to this sprint will be unassigned but not deleted. This action cannot be undone.

Tasks.memberAccessDescription: You need to be a member with an Organic ID to access tasks.
Tasks.title: Task Board
Tasks.subtitle: Track and manage tasks across epochs
Tasks.noActiveSprint: No active sprint yet. Create one to see tasks here.
Tasks.backlogSortHint: Backlog is sorted by community favorites first.

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.blockedBy: Blocked by {count, plural, one {# task} other {# tasks}}
dependencies.circularError: This would create a circular dependency

subtasks.title: Subtasks
subtasks.maxDepthError: Cannot create subtasks under a subtask

templates.title: Task Templates
templates.noTemplatesHint: Council or admin can create templates

ReviewQueue.title: Submission review queue
ReviewQueue.subtitle: Review pending task submissions
ReviewQueue.accessDeniedDescription: Only admin and council members can review submissions.
ReviewQueue.pendingCount: {count, plural, one {# pending submission} other {# pending submissions}}

TaskDetail.alertAdminOnlyDelete: Only admin members can delete tasks
TaskDetail.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
TaskDetail.assignDescription: Select a user to assign this task to:
TaskDetail.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone and will also delete all comments associated with this task.

Profile.pageSubtitle: Manage your account and personal information
Profile.totalSubmissionsHelp: All submissions you've made on tasks.
Profile.noBioYet: No bio yet. Click Edit Profile to add one!
Profile.noSocialLinksYet: No social links yet. Click Edit Profile to add some!
Profile.holdTokensDescription: Hold $ORG tokens? Get your unique Organic ID and become a verified member!
Profile.verifiedMemberDescription: You can now create proposals, vote on decisions, and participate in the Organic DAO.
Profile.toastSessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
Profile.walletMismatchWarning: Connected wallet differs from linked wallet
Profile.walletMismatchDescription: Connected: {connected} | Linked: {linked}. Balance shown is for your linked wallet.
Profile.notificationPreferencesDescription: Choose which categories you want to hear about and how.

Voting.title: Token-Weighted Voting
Voting.signInToVote: Sign in to vote on this proposal
Voting.noTokensAtSnapshot: You did not hold $ORG tokens at the time of the snapshot

admin.startDescription: Start token-weighted voting on this proposal. A snapshot of all token holders will be captured.
admin.votingStillOpen: Voting period has not ended yet. You can force finalize, but this is not recommended.
admin.finalizeDescription: This will calculate the final result and close voting permanently.
admin.finalizeEarlyWarning: Warning: Voting period has not ended. Are you sure you want to finalize early?

delegation.title: Vote Delegation
delegation.noDelegations: No active delegations. Delegate your voting power to a trusted member.
delegation.delegatedPower: {delegated} delegated from {count, plural, one {# member} other {# members}}

Analytics.title: Analytics
Analytics.description: Community metrics, activity trends, and governance insights

charts.activityTrendsDesc: Daily activity over the last 30 days

Treasury.heroDescription: The Organic DAO treasury funds community initiatives, development, and ecosystem growth. All spending requires governance approval through the proposal system.
Treasury.disclaimer: Balances and transactions are fetched live from the Solana blockchain. Allocation percentages are targets and may differ from actual holdings.

Members.title: Members
Members.description: Browse the Organic DAO community directory
Members.emptyDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters
Members.privateProfileDescription: This member has chosen to keep their profile private.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Configure your organization, token, treasury, and governance settings
Settings.accessDeniedDescription: You need admin or council permissions to access settings.

general.name: Organization Name
general.nameDescription: The display name of your DAO
general.orgDescriptionHelp: A short description of your organization

treasury.walletDescription: Solana wallet address for the DAO treasury
treasury.allocationsDescription: How treasury funds are allocated. Must total 100%.

governance.quorumDescription: Minimum participation required for a valid vote
governance.approvalDescription: Percentage of YES votes needed to pass
governance.proposalThresholdDescription: Minimum tokens required to create a proposal
governance.cooldownDescription: Days a proposer must wait between proposals
governance.abstainQuorumDescription: Whether abstain votes count toward meeting quorum

sprints.description: Sprint defaults and Organic ID configuration
sprints.capacityDescription: Default point capacity for new sprints
sprints.organicIdThresholdDescription: Minimum tokens required for Organic ID eligibility (0 = no minimum)

Notifications.title: Notifications
Notifications.pageDescription: Stay up to date with activity on tasks and proposals you follow.
Notifications.emptyPageHint: Follow tasks and proposals to get notified about updates.
